creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: front image of Buddha on lotus pedestal, with four Bodhisattvas around, seated on lotus petals with halos; islands with trees at top; columns of gold inscription following, with scattered red correction marks; ornate lotus leaf decorative pattern on back of frontispiece
medium: Gold and silver on indigo paper
title: Daihōkōbutsu kegonkyō shūjibun (大方廣佛華厳経修慈分), the so-called Jingojikyō (神護寺経)
